welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Stocksbridge, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving low-cost and leisure airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly used for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 4-hour time limit per device.
